attributes.action: all mps to repay fraudulently claimed expenses or i will not pay my council tax in july
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i ask all other members of the pub lic to agree and not pay there council tax in july until the elected members pay all the money back

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
